Name: Subash Selvaraj
AboutMe:
Having more than 6 years of experience in Actionscript, JavaScript, Jquery and PHP development. Currently focusing on developing modern web applications using HTML5, AngularJS, Node.js and have a very good understanding of Parse.com platform.

Before moving into JavaScript I was working extensively on flash, flex and actionscript3.0 development.

Experience:

  • Responsive UI Development using HTML5, CSS3
  • Phonegap development using Javascript, Angularjs, Ionic
  • JS UI Frameworks: AngularJS, Backbone
  • CSS frameworks: Bootstrap
  • CSS preprocessors: SASS, LESS
  • FullStack development (WAMP, LAMP)
  • Latest technologies: NodeJS, Parse.com
  • Visualization Frameworks: Raphael.js, Snap.svg

Workflow Automation Tools:

  • Gruntjs
  • Gulpjs

I love open source and I contribute back to the community here https://github.com/sesubash/

Also I write occasionally in my blog subashselvaraj.com to share my experience and useful snippets.
